name: spec-runner
description: Run specific rspec tests from vscode

commands.title: Ruby Spec Runner: Run this spec/minitest file
Ruby Spec Runner: Run this spec
Ruby Spec Runner: Re-run failed examples
Ruby Spec Runner: Run this test

spec-runner.rspecCommand.markdownDescription:
Rspec: Provide an alternative rspec command. For example you may need to use a different path to rspec.

Can also be used to disable code coverage by passing env vars. Example: `SKIP_COVERAGE=true bundle exec rspec`.

spec-runner.minitestCommand.markdownDescription:
Minitest: Provide an alternative minitest command. For example you may need to use a different path to minitest.

Can also be used to disable code coverage by passing env vars. Example: `SKIP_COVERAGE=true bundle exec rails t`.

spec-runner.changeDirectoryToWorkspaceRo.description: Changes directory to workspace root before running the spec

spec-runner.projectPath.description: Absolute path to project directory (e.g. /home/me/project/sub-folder). Defaults to the workspace directory.

spec-runner.rspecFormat.markdownDescription:
Rspec: Output format for rspec.

- **Documentation:** group and example names
- **Progress:** dots for each example

spec-runner.saveBeforeRunning.description: Save the file before running the spec/test

spec-runner.runAllButton.description: Rspec: Show a status bar button to run the current spec file

spec-runner.runAllFailedButton.description: Rspec: Show a status bar button to re-run the failed examples for the current spec file

spec-runner.runAllMinitestButton.description: Minitest: Show a status bar button to run the current minitest file

spec-runner.codeLensPrompts.description: Rspec: Show code lens prompts to run specific examples or contexts in the editor

spec-runner.minitestCodeLensPrompts.description: Minitest: Show code lens prompts to run specific examples or contexts in the editor

spec-runner.decorateEditorWithSpecResult.description: Rspec: Highlight errors, show spec results in the gutter, and highlighting in the overview ruler.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
